task.title: How to set daily goal in Waterlogged
task.shortdesc: Here's how you set a daily goal in Waterlogged.

step.cmd: Tap the 'Settings' icon in the top-left corner.
Type in your desired amount of water and the proper unit (oz, mL, or L).
Tap 'Save' to be automatically returned to the 'Settings' tab.

taskbody.result: Your daily goal is now set.
